dcterms:creator: B. Wu
X. Zhou
S. Zhao
X. Yue
K. Keutzer
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing 100,000 LiDAR point clouds synthesized in the Grand Theft Auto V (GTA-V) environment, used for training deep neural networks for LiDAR point cloud segmentation.
dcterms:title: GTA-LiDAR

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset containing 10,848 samples with point-wise labels obtained from original 3D bounding boxes, used for evaluating algorithms in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: J. Behley
M. Garbade
A. Milioto
J. Quenzel
S. Behnke
C. Stachniss
J. Gall
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for LiDAR point-cloud segmentation with 21 sequences and 43,442 densely annotated scans, designed for semantic scene understanding.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI
